entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MethodInfo.Invoke AVs when invoking a method with an 'out void*' parameter #59068
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59061
  • Console.ReadKey throws in unexpected circumstances #59059
  • [BUG] TimeBeginPeriod / TimeEndPeriod strange behavior while loading dynamically from an assembly #59058
  • On Linux GetSocketOption will close socket on Don'tLinger request #59055
  • [Mono]: Random crash in interpreter when doing stackwalks as part of STW. #59054
  • Proposal: Use `FieldInfo.GetRawConstantValue` to get the `.data` of fields with `HasFieldRVA`. #59052
  • Code optimization of Debugger.cs (CoreCLR) #59048
    7.0.0
  • Order of serialized properties determined by dictionary enumeration on fast-path source generators #59043
    7.0.0
  • Source generator should share property-level custom converters #59041
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 error on arm64 for GitHub_17777 #59040
  • Custom equality operator in generic expressions provoke BadImageFormatExceptions #59035
  • System.Drawing.Common is no longer usable from < netcoreapp3.1 projects #59032
  • Jit should inline CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_REF (at least for hot paths) #59031
    Future
  • ZipArchive.Open will read non seakable stream to memory & fail with bad error on large streams #59027
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Hard-coded path to Xcode #59022
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions: Missing net standard 2.1 type forwarders in Nuget Package #59021
  • Marshal.GetHINSTANCE(module) works on Windows but not on Linux/OSX #59020
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel.ForAsync #59019
  • Backport `UseConsoleLifetime()` fix from net6 to net5. #59014
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/interlocked/exchange/exchangefloat/exchangefloat.sh #59009
    7.0.0
  • Test Failure SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #59008
    Future

Closed

  • Remove platform restriction from Hosting.WindowsServices #59037
    6.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Versioning - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58664
    6.0.0
  • Run "dotnet --info" on Win11,the RID shown "win10-x64" #58125
  • Microsoft.Win32.Handles - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54871
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Arm64 to ProcessorArchitecture and ImageFileMachine enums #58970
  • System.Net - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54857
    6.0.0
  • System.Security - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54868
    6.0.0
  • `*Operators` interfaces naming #59030
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithInvalidRevocationSignature(pkiOptions: IssuerRevocationViaOcsp | AllEndEntityRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #59010
  • System.Linq - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58662
    6.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!replacedInLowering' #58972
    6.0.0
  • General protection fault on Linux #10631
    Future
  • Test failed: baseservices/threading/threadpool/unregister/regression_749068/regression_749068.sh #13453
    7.0.0
  • Resident Set Size on Linux remains much higher than managed memory usage in .NET 5.0 #52592
    6.0.0
  • Missing prerequisite for dotnet on Alpine #56422
    Future
  • [tvOS] Environment.GetSpecialFolder is too eager in creating the special directories #58787
    6.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\methodoverriding\\regressions\\549411\\exploit\\exploit.cmd #57794
  • MemoryCache stopped working in 5.0.0 #59025
  • System.Text.Json source gen containing non-localized error messages #58292
    6.0.0
  • HashSet<T> take out extra element during 'foreach' #59026
  • [Long Running Test] pauseonstart.sh #58893
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/reverse/reverse/reverse.sh #58599
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #58781
  • .NET 6.0 Model Validation #58886
  • Crossgen2 fails with null reference exception. #58181
    7.0.0
  • [Proposal] Create benchmarks for performance quality assurance #58995

PullRequests

Created

  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59070
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59069
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • UpdateJson and CompilerServices.Unsafe versions #59067
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59064
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change branch name for perf repo clone #59063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Runtime changes for DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer #59062
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59060
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Eliminate PROJECTK_BUILD from RF #59057
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix EventPipe sample profiler resolution on Windows. #59056
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add missing docs to System.Text.Json #59053
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: simple VN budget stress mode #59051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #59047
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #59045
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove benign assert #59044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Add missing System.Linq API docs #59038
    documentation, area-System.Linq
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59029
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #59024
    area-System.Runtime, os-ios
  • Share init-compiler with arcade #59018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Fix variables names in perf automation #59046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.11
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59039
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] browser-bench improvements #59028
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.0
  • Fix EventPipe sample profiler resolution on Windows. #58997
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs (#58592) #58926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58910
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58983
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #58788
    area-System.Runtime, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Remove benign assert #58980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • Add JitStress=1/2 runs to jitstress-isas-x86 pipeline #58822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [Mono]: Potential deadlock during EventPipe rundown using interpreter. #59023
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Use alloca for runtime_invoke retval buffer #59006
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58917
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Remove too-short a timeout for a GCStress test #57245
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst and test fixes for Android #58841
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Add `JitEnregStats` complus. #58776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve error messages expanding single-file #58557
    area-Single-File, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix SIMD temp register interference #58990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Turn on the mobile device telemetry (XHarness workloads) #58864
  • Remove `GTF_NO_CSE` on the first `FIELD_LIST` arg (x86 specific) #57411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #58993
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [Mono]: Potential deadlock during EventPipe rundown using interpreter. #58996
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono] Avoid some null checks in the sgen alloc wrappers. #58968
    area-GC-mono
  • Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #58965
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix SendAsync from inpersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59007
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measurement pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58895
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
  • Experiment with compressing individual method contexts #59000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable outerloop helix legs on the "runtime-coreclr outerloop" pipeline. #57068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add dependency graph viewer tool #55304
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Clear() to MemoryCache #57631
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • Extend MemoryCacheOptions with TrackLinkedCacheEntries #57648
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWasmRuntimes target and use cmake #58878
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Follow up on Scatter/Gather API changes #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Delete dead code #56865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove a volatile access from TaskScheduler.Id #58991
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize thread state transition #58992
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
